Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.32907861]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:Inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50=48.1 pM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide is a high-affinity protein minibinder to the SARS-CoV-2 spike receptor binding domain (RBD) that compete with ACE2 binding.

Literature.Title: De novo design of picomolar SARS-CoV-2 miniprotein inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Cao L, Goreshnik I, Coventry B, Case JB, Miller L, Kozodoy L, Chen RE, Carter L, Walls AC, Park YJ, Strauch EM, Stewart L, Diamond MS, Veesler D, Baker D.
